channel.title: Script on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in Script on NS News and Views

item.title: Excel Macro to manipulate CAT data
item.description: Recently, I was asked whether I could provide some assistance with manipulating data, that had been exported from a CAT results test.  The problem, had slowly been driving a colleague of mine, very slightly crazy!

item.title: Happy with a hack?
item.description:
Most software developers at some point, will almost certainly encounter the need to hack together a solution.

To quote Wikipedia, the term hack, for the purposes of this blog post is:

item.title: PowerShell to secure AD users RDP access
item.description: It’s a sad fact that security can all too often be the poor relative in software and systems design (please note that this blog post is not intended to address system security per se; the OWASP website and / or security expert Troy Hunt’s blog, are good references for that topic).

item.title: Using PowerShell to check all pages in a website
item.description: Recently St Mary’s Shaftesbury had a new website built (I would like to register, that whilst I was actively involved in the project management, I did not design this website).
